name: realistic
trans: 现实主义的；现实的；逼真的

sentences.english: It’s just not realistic to expect a promotion so soon.
sentences.chinese: 这么快就想升职根本不现实。

sentences.chinese: 你对自己一天能完成多少工作量要现实一点。

detailed_translations.english: judging and dealing with situations in a practical way according to what is actually possible rather than what you would like to happen

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要，梗概；抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people

sentences.english: a sculpture of an elephant
sentences.chinese: 一尊大象雕塑

sentences.english: the techniques of sculpture in stone
sentences.chinese: 石雕技艺

detailed_translations.english: an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist

sentences.english: There was a great demand for engravings of his portrait, and his head was being modelled by an admiring sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 人们强烈要求要帮他做一个雕塑，一位有名的雕刻家正在把他的头像做成模型。

sentences.chinese: 我们可以掌握神秘而不可知的未来，从中创出我们所能想象的任何东西，一如雕刻家可以将未成型的石头刻出雕像一样。

sentences.english: This is what the sculptor must do.
sentences.chinese: 而雕塑家就必须做到这一点。

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes sculptures

sentences.english: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.english: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

detailed_translations.english: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: deep religious faith
sentences.chinese: 坚定的宗教信仰

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of trust or confidence in someone or something

sentences.english: He had served the family faithfully for 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 他已忠心耿耿地为这家人服务了40年。

sentences.english: Ann faithfully promised never to tell my secret.
sentences.chinese: 安信誓旦旦地保证决不把我的秘密说出去。

sentences.chinese: 大多数的电脑使用者都没有经过正规的键盘操作训练，因此他们的键盘技巧不够熟练。

sentences.chinese: 这些分子被吸收到血液里，从而影响到器官。

detailed_translations.english: as a result

sentences.english: Denver aimed his gun but did not shoot.
sentences.chinese: 丹佛举枪瞄准，但是没有射击。

sentences.english: My criticism wasn't aimed at you.
sentences.chinese: 我的批评不是针对你的。

sentences.english: They are aiming to reduce unemployment by 50%.
sentences.chinese: 他们正力求使失业人数下降50%。

name: conventional
trans: 常规的；传统的；因循守旧的

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

sentences.chinese: 显然鲍勃吃午饭吃得津津有味。

sentences.chinese: 这些城邦国家自治的传统,确实是文艺复兴的核心所在

name: Mona Lisa
trans: 蒙娜•丽莎（达•芬奇所作的一幅著名肖像画）

sentences.english: Almost everyone knows the painting, Mona Lisa, but not everyone knows of its bizarre history.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都知道蒙娜·丽莎这幅画，可是并非人人了解她的离奇的历史。

sentences.chinese: 他还为她画了肖像，作为最后的爱的信物。 这张肖像一直被认为是一幅伟大的杰作，和蒙娜·丽莎齐名。

sentences.english: The true identity of Mona Lisa and her enigmatic smile have intrigued art lovers around the world.
sentences.chinese: 蒙娜丽莎的真实身份和她神秘的微笑令全世界的艺术爱好者为之着迷。

sentences.chinese: 她在使用计算机扫描之后发现，都灵裹尸布的遗像与列奥纳多·达·芬奇的自画像具有诸多相同的特点。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

sentences.english: a dazzling display (= very good display ) of flowers
sentences.chinese: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.english: The window display caught her eye.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.english: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.chinese: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement of things for people to look at or buy
to show something to people, or put it in a place where people can see it easily

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

name: appeal to
trans: （对某人）有吸引力；（使某人）感兴趣

sentences.english: The programme appeals to young children.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目受小孩子喜欢。

detailed_translations.chinese: （对某人）有吸引力；（使某人）感兴趣

sentences.english: The economy remains extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 经济仍然极其脆弱。

sentences.english: Her father is now 86 and in fragile health.
sentences.chinese: 她的父亲现在86岁，身体虚弱。

detailed_translations.english: weak and uncertain; easily destroyed or spoilt

name: circular
trans: 圆(形)的,环形的；循环的；环行的

sentences.english: a circular table
sentences.chinese: 圆桌

sentences.english: a circular bus route
sentences.chinese: 环行公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: shaped like a circle

sentences.english: a metropolitan area of South Australia
sentences.chinese: 南澳大利亚的一个都市区

sentences.english: ...the Ukrainian Catholic representatives, Metropolitan Volodymyr and Bishop Sofron.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰的天主教代表——弗拉基米尔大主教和索夫龙主教

detailed_translations.english: relating or belonging to a very large city
a metropolitan is an important priest in the Orthodox and Catholic Churches. He has authority over other priests and is in charge of a particular area.

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

sentences.english: modern American civilization
sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的古代文明

detailed_translations.english: a society that is well organized and developed, used especially about a particular society in a particular place or at a particular time

sentences.english: They caravaned through Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 他们结队在埃及坐大篷车旅行。

sentences.english: The established religion of Egypt is Islam.
sentences.chinese: 埃及的国教是伊斯兰教。

sentences.english: Glazes had been used from ancient times in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 埃及自古代起就使用釉料。

sentences.english: ...the Egyptian pharaoh.
sentences.chinese: ...古埃及法老。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Egypt or its people
someone from Egypt

sentences.english: Artists translate their ideas into visual images.
sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

detailed_translations.english: relating to seeing

sentences.english: fragrant flowers
sentences.chinese: 芳香的花朵

detailed_translations.english: having a pleasant smell

sentences.english: Monet described his attempts to observe and capture the colors in nature thus: “I’m chasing the merest sliver of color.
sentences.chinese: 莫奈如此描述自己观察和捕捉大自然中的色彩的尝试：“我追逐最最细微的色彩。

sentences.english: But this rarely works-after all, a knowledgeable collector isn't going to buy a stolen Monet that he can't display publicly.
sentences.chinese: 但这种情况很少，毕竟知识渊博的藏家不会买一副被盗而无法公开展示的莫奈名画。

sentences.english: Monet said: “Color owes its brightness to force of contrast rather than to its inherent qualities … primary colors look brightest when they are brought into contrast with their complementaries.
sentences.chinese: 莫奈说过：“色彩的亮度，是源于对比的力度，而非其固有特质……原色在与其补色对比时，看起来最亮。”

sentences.english: That may be extreme, but Ms. Whitney argues that the boom years are not coming back anytime soon.
sentences.chinese: 这也许有点极端，但是惠特尼女士还是坚持繁荣的年代还没有到来的观点。

sentences.english: Prof. CROSS: You know the - you remember that song that Whitney Houston wrote, "The Greatest Love of All"?
sentences.chinese: 克洛斯教授：你知道——你记得惠特尼休斯顿写的那首歌《最伟大的爱》吗？

sentences.english: And now there’s a brand new paper in Psychological Science by Faraz Farzin, Susan Rivera and David Whitney that provides some of the best evidence yet for the lantern hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 法拉兹-法曾，苏珊-里维拉和大卫-惠特尼在"心理科学"杂志上有一篇新论文，为灯笼的假设提供了到目前为止最好的证据。

sentences.english: On Monday morning Jemmy sauntered on the road of Madison Square.
sentences.chinese: 星期一的上午杰米还在麦迪逊广场的马路上闲逛。

sentences.english: But if you live in a little town like Madison, Wisconsin, there is, really, no red eye.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你住在一些小城镇，例如威斯康星州的麦迪逊，那里连红眼航班都没有。

sentences.english: If a new person moved into Madison County, they would know within a week if he or she was a Democrat or a Republican.
sentences.chinese: 如果一个人刚刚搬到麦迪逊县，那么不出一个星期，他们就会知道此人是民主党人还是共和党人。

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time

sentences.english: He gave up a permanent job in order to freelance.
sentences.chinese: 他放弃了固定工作，为的是当一名自由职业者。

sentences.english: a permanent change in your eating habits
sentences.chinese: 饮食习惯的永久改变

sentences.english: The blindness that the disease causes will be permanent.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病引起的失明是永久性的。

sentences.english: Miller soon became a permanent fixture (= someone or something that is always there ) on the team.
sentences.chinese: 米勒很快就成为球队的固定队员。

detailed_translations.english: continuing to exist for a long time or for all the time in the future

sentences.english: a house in a pleasant suburban district
sentences.chinese: 地处宜人郊区的一幢房屋

detailed_translations.english: an area of a town or the countryside, especially one with particular features

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

sentences.english: He reads a lot of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 他大量阅读诗歌。

sentences.english: a poetry magazine
sentences.chinese: 诗歌杂志

detailed_translations.english: poems in general, or the art of writing them

sentences.english: The old clock ticked noisily.
sentences.chinese: 那只古老的钟大声地嘀嗒着。

detailed_translations.english: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
A tick is a written mark like a V. It is used to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.
to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc

name: rhyme
trans: 押韵短诗；〔押韵的〕儿歌，童谣

sentences.english: a collection of traditional rhymes with illustrations
sentences.chinese: 带插图的经典童谣集

sentences.english: The song has rhyming couplets (= pairs of lines that end in words that rhyme ) .
sentences.chinese: 这首歌有同韵的对句。

detailed_translations.chinese: 押韵短诗；〔押韵的〕儿歌，童谣
detailed_translations.english: a short poem or song, especially for children, using words that rhyme
if two words or lines of poetry rhyme, they end with the same sound, including a vowel

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

sentences.english: Her voice was full of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.english: Kim received the news without showing any visible sign of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 金接到消息时丝毫不露声色。

detailed_translations.english: a strong human feeling such as love, hate, or anger

sentences.english: She puts her baby in this nursery and then goes back to work.
sentences.chinese: 她把孩子送到这家托儿所然后回去上班。

sentences.english: The garden, developed over the past 35 years, includes a nursery.
sentences.chinese: 这个有35年历史的花园里有一个苗圃。

detailed_translations.english: a place where young children are taken care of during the day while their parents are at work

sentences.english: This is a well-known nursery rhyme.
sentences.chinese: 这是一支大家都很熟悉的童谣。

sentences.english: Now many people might think that I was only joking when in one of my articles lately I said that reading the English nursery rhyme about Taffy the Welshman could help to educate the soul of a man.
sentences.chinese: 余新近写有一文，曰，读威尔士人泰菲所作之英语童谣，有益于教化人之心灵。 览此文者，多以为，此乃玩笑而已。

sentences.english: “In 1492 Columbus sailed the ocean blue” is how the children’s nursery rhyme begins.
sentences.chinese: “1492年，哥伦布在蓝色海洋上乘风破浪”，这成为孩子们童谣的开头曲。

detailed_translations.english: a short traditional poem or song for children

sentences.english: What does that mean in concrete terms ?
sentences.chinese: 具体来说那到底是什么意思？

sentences.english: the lack of any concrete evidence
sentences.chinese: 缺少具体证据的

sentences.english: a dialogue about concrete issues and problems
sentences.chinese: 有关具体事情和问题的对话

detailed_translations.english: definite and specific

sentences.english: Children used to learn by repetition.
sentences.chinese: 过去小孩子是通过背诵来学习的。

detailed_translations.english: doing or saying the same thing many times

sentences.english: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 海关官员们对于这种设备做出了一系列相互矛盾的陈述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的
detailed_translations.english: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct

sentences.english: Ella asked them to hush their voices.
sentences.chinese: 埃拉叫他们别作声。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone stop shouting, talking, crying etc
a period of silence, especially when people are expecting something to happen

name: mockingbird
trans: 嘲鸫（一种鸟，能模仿其他鸟的叫声）

sentences.english: A mockingbird is a kind of gray songbird.
sentences.chinese: 知更鸟是一种灰白色的会唱歌的鸟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嘲鸫（一种鸟，能模仿其他鸟的叫声）
detailed_translations.english: an American bird that copies the songs of other birds

sentences.english: a diamond engagement ring
sentences.chinese: 订婚钻戒

detailed_translations.chinese: 钻石，金刚石；菱形；方块牌
detailed_translations.english: a clear, very hard valuable stone, used in jewellery and in industry

sentences.chinese: 老式黄铜床架

sentences.english: to clean/polish the brass
sentences.chinese: 擦净 / 擦亮黄铜器

detailed_translations.english: a very hard bright yellow metal that is a mixture of  copper  and  zinc
A billy goat is a male goat

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡绅；侍从；大地主；地方法官
detailed_translations.english: the man who in the past owned most of the land around a country village in England

sentences.english: a country cottage
sentences.chinese: 乡间小屋

sentences.english: We’re staying in a holiday cottage in Dorset.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在多塞特的一个度假小别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小屋；村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅
detailed_translations.english: a small house in the country

sentences.english: What coffin?
sentences.chinese: 什么棺材？

sentences.english: When one's coffin is covered, all discussion about him can be settled.
sentences.chinese: 盖棺论定。

detailed_translations.english: a long box in which a dead person is buried or burnt

sentences.english: The myrtle, dove, sparrow, and swan are sacred to her.
sentences.chinese: 桃金娘，鸽子，麻雀和天鹅是她的圣物。

sentences.english: Appearing in great danger, the tiny sparrow tumbled on to the lawn, but softy Flint appeared to have taken pity on him.
sentences.chinese: 跌落在草地上的小麻雀看起来处于非常危险的境地，但是温柔的“弗林特”似乎非常同情他。

sentences.english: Only a solitary cracked-voiced reed-sparrow greeted her from the bushes by the river, in a sad, machine-made tone, resembling that of a past friend whose friendship she had outworn.
sentences.chinese: 只有一只声音嘶哑的芦雀，在河边的树丛中用悲伤机械的音调向她打招呼，就像一个已经没有了友谊的从前的朋友向她打招呼的声音一样。

detailed_translations.english: a small brown bird, very common in many parts of the world

sentences.english: She nursed her kitten all evening.
sentences.chinese: 整个晚上她一直抱着她的小猫咪。

sentences.english: Don't starve the kitten.
sentences.chinese: 别饿着小猫。

sentences.english: Let someone else waste their own time filtering out the kitten stories.
sentences.chinese: 让别的某某人去浪费时间筛选这些小猫的故事吧。

detailed_translations.english: a young cat

sentences.english: Just take it easy and tell us what happened.
sentences.chinese: 别急，告诉我们发生了什么事。

sentences.english: If she continues drawing on the reserve at the current rate, she will run out of funds by 2012 – the year of her diamond jubilee.
sentences.chinese: 如果她继续按目前的速度提取储备金的话，她将在2012年——她的钻石婚纪念那年——用完储备基金。

sentences.english: Another simple form of poem that students can easily write is the cinquain, a poem made up of five lines.
sentences.chinese: 另外一种学生容易写的简体诗是由五行组成的，叫做五行诗。

sentences.english: It is easy to write and, like the cinquain, can give a clear picture and create a special feeling using the minimum of words.
sentences.chinese: 用五行诗，学生可以用少量的词语传递一幅动人的画面。

sentences.english: It is easy to write, and like the cinquain, can give a clear picture and create a special feeling using the minimum of words.
sentences.chinese: 它书写简便，而且跟五行诗相似，用最少的词语就可以描述一个鲜明的画面和创造特殊的情感。

detailed_translations.english: a stanza of five lines

sentences.english: This is because objects may be made up of other objects.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为对象可能是由其他对象构成的。

sentences.english: Don’t get upset. I was only teasing .
sentences.chinese: 别生气，我只是在逗你玩。

sentences.english: He used to tease her mercilessly .
sentences.chinese: 他过去总是无情地取笑她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取笑；戏弄；梳理；欺负；强求；使起毛
detailed_translations.english: to laugh at someone and make jokes in order to have fun by embarrassing them, either in a friendly way or in an unkind way

detailed_translations.chinese: 戏弄；爱纠缠的小孩；挑逗者；卖弄风骚的女孩
detailed_translations.english: someone who enjoys making jokes at people, and embarrassing them, especially in a friendly way

sentences.english: a slightly salty taste
sentences.chinese: 一丁点咸味

sentences.english: salty foods
sentences.chinese: 咸味的食物

detailed_translations.english: tasting of or containing salt

sentences.english: The plant needs some water – it’s starting to droop.
sentences.chinese: 这株植物需要浇些水——它开始打蔫了。

sentences.english: His eyelids began to droop (= close, because he was sleepy ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的眼皮开始耷拉下来了。

sentences.english: Jessie drooped her head.
sentences.chinese: 杰茜垂下头。

sentences.english: ...the droop of his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: …他肩膀的耷拉像。

detailed_translations.english: to hang or bend down, or to make something do this
Droop is also a noun

sentences.english: The prospect of flying filled me with dread .
sentences.chinese: 想到要乘飞机我充满了恐惧。

sentences.english: She lives in dread of (= is continuously very afraid of ) the disease returning.
sentences.chinese: 她整天担心着会旧病复发。

detailed_translations.english: a strong fear of something that is going to happen or may happen
to feel anxious or worried about something that is going to happen or may happen

sentences.english: an endless stream of visitors
sentences.chinese: 川流不息的游客

sentences.english: The possibilities are endless.
sentences.chinese: 有无限的可能性。

sentences.english: He’s been in a lot of trouble – drugs, guns, blackmail – the list is endless.
sentences.chinese: 他麻烦太多了——毒品、枪支、敲诈——说都说不完。

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount, size, or number

sentences.english: Haiku is a kind of Japanese poetry.
sentences.chinese: 俳句是日本的一种诗歌。

detailed_translations.english: a type of Japanese poem with three lines consisting of five, seven, and five syllables

sentences.english: The accent falls on the third syllable.
sentences.chinese: 重音落在第三个音节上。

sentences.english: The stress falls on the second syllable.
sentences.chinese: 重音在第二个音节上。

sentences.english: Accentuate the word “accent”on the first syllable.
sentences.chinese: 在“accent”一词的第一个音节上加重音符号。

detailed_translations.english: a word or part of a word which contains a single vowel sound

name: minimum
trans: 最低限度；最少量;最小数

sentences.english: This will take a minimum of one hour.
sentences.chinese: 这最少要用一个小时。

sentences.english: The minimum number of students we need to run the course is fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们开这门课程最少要有15个学生。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary
the minimum number, degree, or amount of something is the smallest or least that is possible, allowed, or needed

sentences.english: She read the letter and gave us a rough translation (= she did not translate everything exactly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.english: I’ve only read ‘Madame Bovary’ in translation (= not in its original language ) .
sentences.chinese: 我只读过《包法利夫人》的翻译本。

sentences.english: Much of the book’s humour has been lost in translation (= is no longer effective when translated ) .
sentences.chinese: 本书的许多幽默元素已在翻译过程中丢失。

detailed_translations.english: when you translate something, or something that has been translated

name: branch

sentences.english: I think each and every one of us is responsible for the greenhouse gases we emit in our daily actions and choices.
sentences.chinese: 我认为每一个人都是我们每天的行动和选择中排放的温室气体的责任。

sentences.english: But presently it was set in a greenhouse, where the sunlight fell warm upon it, and water was sprinkled over it, and day by day as it waited, a change began to come to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是过了不久，黏土又给人放进了一间温室，这里阳光和煦地照射着它，并且经常给它喷水，这样就在它一天天静静等候的时候，某种变化终于开始到来。

detailed_translations.english: a glass building used for growing plants that need warmth, light, and protection

sentences.english: By mid-morning, the temperature was already above 100 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 到上午10点左右，气温已超过华氏100度了。

detailed_translations.english: Fahrenheit is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 32 degrees and boils at 212 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °F.
a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 32˚ and boils at 212˚

sentences.english: The peace agreement came about through intense pressure by the international community.
sentences.chinese: 该和平协议是在国际社会的强大压力下产生的。

sentences.english: That came about when we went to New York last year.
sentences.chinese: 那件事发生在去年我们去纽约时。

detailed_translations.english: When you say how or when something came about, you say how or when it happened

sentences.english: Sophie: Look! Who is that guy on the stage?
sentences.chinese: 索菲：看那边，舞台上的那个人是谁啊？

sentences.english: "One small step for man, " Neil Armstrong said.
sentences.chinese: “个人一小步”，尼尔.阿姆斯特朗说道。

sentences.english: Aldrin soon followed Armstrong down the ladder to become the second man to stand on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 奥尔德林不久跟随阿姆斯特朗走下舷梯，成为在月球上登陆的第二个人。

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

sentences.english: The gang picked their victims at random.
sentences.chinese: 这帮犯罪分子随意选择对象下手。

sentences.english: The company has introduced random drug testing of its employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司已实行对雇员的随机毒品测试。

detailed_translations.english: without any definite plan, aim, or pattern
happening or chosen without any definite plan, aim, or pattern

sentences.english: Homelessness is not a new phenomenon .
sentences.chinese: 无家可归已不是什么新现象。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens or exists in society, science, or nature, especially something that is studied because it is difficult to understand

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

sentences.english: I have never subscribed to the view that schooldays are the happiest days of your life.
sentences.chinese: 我从未赞同过这样的看法，以为学生时代是一生中最快乐的日子。

sentences.english: You can subscribe to the magazine for as little as 32 a year.
sentences.chinese: 一年只需 32 美元就可以订阅这份杂志。

sentences.english: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.english: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ).
sentences.chinese: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant that lived many thousands of years ago and that has been preserved, or the shape of one of these animals or plants that has been preserved in rock

sentences.english: Coal is one of the cheapest fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤是最廉价的燃料之一。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as coal, gas, or oil that can be burned to produce heat or energy
if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it

sentences.english: The raw material for the tyre is a byproduct of oil refining.
sentences.chinese: 这种轮胎的原料是汽油提炼的副产品。

detailed_translations.english: A byproduct is something that is produced during the manufacture or processing of another product

sentences.english: Janice: It's been three years!
sentences.chinese: 贾尼斯：三年了！

sentences.english: Methane is one of the principal gases contributing to the greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷是造成温室效应的主要气体之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: [有化] 甲烷；[能源] 沼气
detailed_translations.english: a gas that you cannot see or smell, which can be burned to give heat

sentences.english: Highest temperatures 11° Celsius, that's 52° Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 最高温度11摄氏度，即52华氏度。

detailed_translations.english: Celsius is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 0˚ and boils at 100˚

sentences.english: Your work has improved in quantity and quality this term.
sentences.chinese: 这学期你的作业在完成数量和质量上都有提高。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that can be counted or measured

sentences.english: They captured more than ten thousand prisoners and large quantities of arms in that campaign.
sentences.chinese: 他们在那次战役中俘获了一万多战俘和大量武器。

sentences.english: The quantities of each element type will be handy tools for estimating the total effort required.
sentences.chinese: 每种元素类型的数量对于估计所需的总工作量将是便利的工具。

sentences.english: Upstream is the poisonous Berkeley Pit, an open-pit mine in Butte, which was once called the Richest Hill on Earth for the quantities of gold, silver and copper mined there.
sentences.chinese: 上游是有毒的伯克利矿坑，一个比尤特的露天矿。 它曾经被称为地球上最富有的矿山，因为这里的金、银和铜矿数量巨大。

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

sentences.english: Interest rates went up.
sentences.chinese: 利率上涨了。

sentences.english: The cost has gone up to $1.95 a minute.
sentences.chinese: 价格已涨到了一分钟$1.95。

detailed_translations.english: If a price, amount, or level goes up, it becomes higher or greater than it was

sentences.english: It was Charles Keeling who measured the carbon dioxide content in the atmosphere between 1957 and 1997.
sentences.chinese: 是查尔斯。奎林把1957-1997年期间大气层中二氧化碳的含量作了精确的统计。

sentences.english: What’s your waist measurement?
sentences.chinese: 你腰围是多少？

sentences.english: accurate measurement of body temperature
sentences.chinese: 体温的精确测量

detailed_translations.english: the length, height etc of something

sentences.english: How much does it cost per kilo?
sentences.chinese: 每公斤多少钱？

sentences.english: rooms costing £40 per night
sentences.chinese: 每晚收费40英镑的房间

sentences.english: Admission is £9.95 per adult.
sentences.chinese: 成人门票每位9.95英镑。

sentences.english: My car does 12 miles per litre (= for each litre of petrol ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的汽车每升汽油跑12英里。

sentences.english: The meal cost $25 per head (= for or by each person ) .
sentences.chinese: 那顿饭人均花费25美元。

detailed_translations.english: for each

sentences.english: The research involves collecting data from two random samples.
sentences.chinese: 该项研究需要从两个随机样本里收集资料。

detailed_translations.english: information or facts
information or facts

sentences.english: This will result in output containing both the starting and ending addresses of the compiled code for each method.
sentences.chinese: 这将会导致在输出结果中包含每个方法已编译的代码的起始地址和结束地址。

sentences.english: This meeting should result in some change in how they work for the coming sprints, because they work to continually improve their team and practice effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这个会议会导致迎接下一个冲刺阶段所做工作的一些转变，因为他们会不断工作以提高团队的实践效率。

sentences.english: In this case, requests from one service policy which demand excessive CPU and lead to overload could result in breached service goals for the other policy or for both policies.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，一个服务策略中的请求需要过多 CPU 资源，这会导致过载，进而导致另一个策略或这两个策略的服务目标被破坏。

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

sentences.english: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death

sentences.english: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.english: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.english: Towns and cities all over the country have been flooded.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

detailed_translations.english: a very large amount of water that covers an area that is usually dry
to cover a place with water, or to become covered with water

sentences.english: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

sentences.english: the great potato famine in Ireland
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰严重的土豆荒

sentences.english: A million people are facing famine .
sentences.chinese: 一百万人正面临饥荒。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a large number of people have little or no food for a long time and many people die

sentences.english: On the other hand, there are those, like George Hambley, who are opposed to this view, believe that we should not worry about high levels of carbon dioxide in the air.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，还有一些人，像科学家乔治治·汉布利，反对上面的观点，他们认为我们不必担心空气中会有高含量的二氧化碳。

sentences.english: Congress is continuing to oppose the President’s health care budget.
sentences.chinese: 国会继续反对总统的医疗保健预算。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something such as a plan or idea and try to prevent it from happening or succeeding

sentences.english: I am utterly opposed to any form of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 我坚决反对任何形式的恐怖主义。

sentences.english: The principles of capitalism and socialism are diametrically opposed (= completely opposite ).
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的原则与社会主义的原则截然相反。

detailed_translations.english: If you are opposed to something, you disagree with it or disapprove of it.

sentences.english: I am utterly opposed to any form of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 我坚决反对任何形式的恐怖主义。

sentences.english: His voice was soft and mild.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音轻柔温和。

sentences.english: a mild herbicide
sentences.chinese: 药力温和的除草剂

detailed_translations.english: a mild person has a gentle character and does not easily get angry

sentences.english: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.chinese: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.english: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.english: the environmental impact of pollution from cars
sentences.chinese: 汽车造成的污染对环境的影响

sentences.english: an environmental group
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织

detailed_translations.english: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

detailed_translations.chinese: 环保人士；环境论者；研究环境问题的专家
detailed_translations.english: someone who is concerned about protecting the environment

sentences.english: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

sentences.english: She was in an extremely confused state of mind .
sentences.chinese: 她思绪纷乱。

sentences.english: She can’t go home now. Look at the state of her!
sentences.chinese: 她现在不能回家。看看她这副样子！

sentences.english: The country was in a state of war (= officially fighting a war ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个国家正处于战争状态。

sentences.english: Water exists in three states: liquid, gaseous, and solid.
sentences.chinese: 水有三种形态: 液态、气态和固态。

sentences.english: ...reform of the state social-security system.
sentences.chinese: …国家社会保障体制的改革。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental condition that someone or something is in
to formally say or write a piece of information or your opinion
State industries or organizations are financed and organized by the government rather than private companies

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

sentences.english: She’s going to have problems finding a job even if she gets her A levels.
sentences.chinese: 即使通过了高级程度考试，她以后找工作也还是成问题。

sentences.english: Her coach encouraged her throughout the marathon race to keep on running.
sentences.chinese: 她的教练在马拉松赛全程鼓励她继续不断奔跑。

sentences.english: Wyatt glanced around the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 怀亚特环视了一下餐馆。

sentences.english: Emily glanced over her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉回头看了一眼。

sentences.english: He gave her a quick glance and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速地瞥了她一眼，笑了。

detailed_translations.english: to quickly look at someone or something
a quick look

sentences.english: It takes a steady hand to perform surgery.
sentences.chinese: 做手术手要稳。

sentences.english: The plane steadied, and the passengers relaxed
sentences.chinese: 飞机平稳后，乘客们松了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: firmly held in a particular position and not moving or shaking
to hold someone or something so they become more balanced or controlled, or to become more balanced or controlled

sentences.english: The bus climbed steadily up the road.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车稳定地沿公路向上爬。

sentences.english: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.chinese: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

detailed_translations.chinese: 趋向， 趋势， 倾向
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: Our opinions are on the whole the same.
sentences.chinese: 我们的意见基本上是一样的。

sentences.english: A small car is more economical to run.
sentences.chinese: 开小型汽车比较省油。

sentences.english: good-quality clothes at economical prices
sentences.chinese: 物美价廉的衣服

detailed_translations.english: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any

sentences.english: Mist rose from a nearby stand of thriving eucalyptus trees she planted after receiving title to more than a hectare of farmland.
sentences.chinese: 雾气从附近生长繁茂的桉树林中升起，这些树是她在获得对一公顷多农田的所有权后栽种的。

sentences.english: This could be estimated at 1000 litres of hydrogen for 330 grams of chlorophyll per day whereas for example colza produces roughly only 1000 litres of oil per hectare . . .
sentences.chinese: 这种农场每天估计能够产生1000升氢气，而且只消耗330克叶绿素； 而比如种植菜籽，每公顷土地才能产生大约1000升油。

sentences.english: Researchers at the algae greenhouse plan to scale up the trial to a 100 hectare (247 acre) site over the next three years.
sentences.chinese: 藻类温室的研究人员计划在未来三年内将试验范围扩大到一片100公顷（合247英亩）的场地上。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring area, equal to 10,000 square metres

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

sentences.english: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.chinese: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

sentences.english: Pablo led a miserable existence when he first moved to San Juan.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗刚搬到圣胡安时，生活很悲惨。

detailed_translations.english: the state of existing

sentences.english: His inner conflict is related to struggles in the outer world.
sentences.chinese: 他内心的矛盾和外部世界的争斗有关。

detailed_translations.english: relating to objects, activities etc that are part of the world, as opposed to your own thoughts and feelings

name: on behalf of
trans: 代表……一方；作为……的代言人

sentences.english: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 他代表全体教职员工讲了话。

sentences.english: There is one database heap per database, and the database manager uses it on behalf of all applications connected to the database.
sentences.chinese: 每个数据库都有一个数据库堆，数据库管理器使用它来代表连接到数据库上的所有应用程序。

detailed_translations.english: as the representative of sb or instead of them

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

sentences.english: Extremists were openly advocating violence.
sentences.chinese: 极端主义者公开鼓吹使用暴力。

sentences.english: Mr. Williams is a conservative who advocates fewer government controls on business.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯先生是一位提倡减少政府对商业的控制的保守人士。

detailed_translations.english: If you advocate a particular action or plan, you recommend it publicly
someone who publicly supports someone or something

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

sentences.english: They had put up with behaviour from their son which they would not have tolerated from anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他们容忍了自己儿子的行为，而换作别的任何人，他们才不会容忍。

detailed_translations.english: If you put up with something, you tolerate or accept it, even though you find it unpleasant or unsatisfactory

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

sentences.english: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 刺激经济增长的措施

detailed_translations.english: an increase in amount, number, or size

sentences.english: The fire was caused by an electrical fault.
sentences.chinese: 大火是电力故障引起的。

sentences.english: an electrical engineer
sentences.chinese: 电力[电气]工程师

detailed_translations.english: relating to electricity

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes

sentences.english: a casual manner
sentences.chinese: 漫不经心的态度

sentences.english: His eyes were angry, though he sounded casual.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他的语气满不在乎，但他的眼神充满怒气。

sentences.english: It plays an increasingly important part in meteorology for cloud, precipitation, hail and thunderstorm detection as well as the navigation of aircraft and ships.
sentences.chinese: 它在对云层、降水、冰雹和雷暴的气象探测以及在船舰和飞机的导航中，起着日益重要的作用。

sentences.english: The Fermi Space Telescope is so sensitive to these gamma ray bursts that it doesn't even need to be positioned right over a thunderstorm to detect the TGFs.
sentences.chinese: 费米太空望远镜对这些伽马射线脉冲很灵敏，以至于它甚至不需要调整位置对准雷暴的正上方，就能来探测TGF信号。

detailed_translations.english: a storm with thunder and lightning

sentences.english: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources
sentences.chinese: 我们星球上的宝贵资源

detailed_translations.english: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

sentences.english: The key to success as a romantic novelist is absolute belief in your story.
sentences.chinese: 一个浪漫派小说家成功的关键在于对自己故事的绝对信念。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes novels

sentences.english: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.chinese: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。

sentences.english: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
sentences.chinese: 大雾笼罩了田野。

sentences.english: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午，雾散了。

detailed_translations.english: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
detailed_translations.english: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

sentences.english: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that has official information on it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it

sentences.english: ...silk and satin in every shade of the rainbow.
sentences.chinese: …如彩虹般五颜六色的丝绸与锦缎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 彩虹；五彩缤纷的排列；幻想
detailed_translations.english: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain

detailed_translations.chinese: 使呈彩虹状；如彩虹般装饰

sentences.english: This sofa is so uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这张沙发太不舒服了。

detailed_translations.english: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

sentences.english: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

detailed_translations.english: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

sentences.english: She was found alive but unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 她被找到时还活着，但已不省人事。

detailed_translations.english: unable to see, move, feel etc in the normal way because you are not conscious

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
an occasion when someone takes photographs or makes a film

sentences.english: In the opening shot, we see Travolta’s feet walking down the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在开场的镜头中，我们看到特拉沃尔塔的脚在人行道上行走。

detailed_translations.english: the view of something in a film or television programme that is produced by having the camera in a particular position

detailed_translations.chinese: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的
detailed_translations.english: in bad condition because of being used too much or treated badly

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: His lip started to tremble and then he started to cry.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴唇开始颤抖，接着就哭了起来。

sentences.english: I will never forget the look on the patient's face, the tremble in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 我将永远不会忘记那病人脸上的表情和他颤抖的手。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly in a way that you cannot control, especially because you are upset or frightened
Tremble is also a noun

sentences.english: Ian came off the squash court dripping with sweat .
sentences.chinese: 伊恩大汗淋漓地离开壁球场。

sentences.english: Beads of sweat appeared on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上冒出了汗珠。

sentences.english: I was sweating a lot despite the air conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 尽管开着空调，我仍是满头大汗。

detailed_translations.english: drops of salty liquid that come out through your skin when you are hot, frightened, ill, or doing exercise
to have drops of salty liquid coming out through your skin because you are hot, ill, frightened, or doing exercise

sentences.english: She gave me an anxious look.
sentences.chinese: 她焦急地看了我一眼。

sentences.english: He seemed most anxious to speak to me alone.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎迫切地想同我单独谈谈。

detailed_translations.english: causing anxiety; showing anxiety

sentences.english: his feelings of anxiety
sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

sentences.english: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.chinese: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.english: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.chinese: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being very worried about something

sentences.english: Her face distorted in panic.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸因恐慌而变相了。

sentences.english: The panic-stricken fled in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 惊慌的人群向四面八方逃去。

sentences.english: They ascribed courage to me for something I did out of sheer panic.
sentences.chinese: 由于我纯粹因惊慌而做的事，他们认为我很有勇气。

sentences.english: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.chinese: 你能从电视上海啸和地震的生还者的脸上看到这点。

sentences.english: They urged other town residents unaffected by the quake and tsunami to do the same.
sentences.chinese: 他们敦促其他没有受到地震和海啸影响的城镇居民也这样做。

sentences.english: But I am lucky because we did get a little bit of the tsunami but nothing like what they got up north.
sentences.chinese: 但我算是幸运的因为我们这只受到了海啸很小的侵害远不及北方所受到的那样。

detailed_translations.english: a very large wave, caused by extreme conditions such as an  earthquake  , which can cause a lot of damage when it reaches land

sentences.english: You have only three minutes to glance through this article.
sentences.chinese: 你只能用三分钟很快地看一遍这篇文章。

sentences.english: A few others in Sanjiazi speak a bit of Manchu.
sentences.chinese: 三家子的只有一些村民会讲少量的满语。

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

sentences.english: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.chinese: 那间小小的预制棚屋被一台巨大的起重机吊走了。

sentences.english: She craned her neck to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 她伸长脖子以便看得清楚一些。

sentences.english: Children craned to get close to him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们伸长脖子想靠近他。

detailed_translations.english: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
If you crane your neck or head, you stretch your neck in a particular direction in order to see or hear something better

sentences.english: The leopard's skin is marked with black spots.
sentences.chinese: 豹皮上有黑色斑点。

sentences.english: The young leopard separated from its mother would be eaten by other beast.
sentences.chinese: 与母亲离散的幼豹很可能被其他的野兽吃掉。

sentences.english: Her talent was not in gathering information but in analyzing and assessing—a meticulous organizer who plotted and planned with the cunning of a leopard.
sentences.chinese: 她的才华不在信息收集，而在于分析和评估，一个细微谨慎的组织者，策划着，盘算着有如美洲豹般的狡猾。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family, with yellow fur and black spots, which lives in Africa and South Asia

sentences.english: a mountainous area with spectacular scenery
sentences.chinese: 景色壮丽的山区

sentences.english: a spectacular success
sentences.chinese: 辉煌的成就

sentences.english: a television spectacular
sentences.chinese: 场面盛大的电视节目

detailed_translations.english: very impressive
an event or performance that is very large and impressive

sentences.english: I bathed, washed my hair, and got dressed.
sentences.chinese: 我洗了澡，洗了头，然后穿上衣服。

sentences.english: He bathed the children and put them to bed.
sentences.chinese: 他给孩子们洗了澡，然后把他们弄上床。

sentences.english: They bathed in the lake in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 月光下，他们在湖里游泳。

sentences.english: She brought a bowl of water and began to bathe the injured arm.
sentences.chinese: 她拿来一盆水，开始清洗受伤的手臂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗澡；给…洗；游泳；浸洗; 浸泡
detailed_translations.english: to wash yourself or someone else in a bath

sentences.english: Matt’s behavior was arousing the interest of the neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 马特的行为渐渐引起了邻居的兴趣。

sentences.english: Anne had to be aroused from a deep sleep.
sentences.chinese: 不得不把安妮从沉睡中唤醒。

detailed_translations.english: to make you become interested, expect something etc; to wake someone

sentences.english: He was presented with a watch in appreciation of his long service.
sentences.chinese: 他获赠一块手表，作为对其长期服务的感谢。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being grateful for something someone has done

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山顶

sentences.english: jagged peaks
sentences.chinese: 嶙峋的山峰

sentences.english: It was a time of peak demand for the product.
sentences.chinese: 那是对该产品需求最旺的时期。

detailed_translations.english: the sharply pointed top of a mountain
used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something

sentences.english: After a little gentle persuasion , Debbie agreed to let us in.
sentences.chinese: 好言劝说了几句后，黛比就同意让我们进去了。

sentences.english: It had taken a great deal of persuasion to get him to accept.
sentences.chinese: 费尽了口舌才让他接受。

sentences.english: She used all her powers of persuasion (= skill at persuading people ) to convince Tilly that it was the right thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 她使尽浑身解数，才劝服蒂莉应该那么做。

detailed_translations.english: the act of persuading someone to do something

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done
